titles.title: To terminate the price support and marketing quota programs for peanuts.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Risk Management, Research and Specialty Crops.

committee.subcommittee: Risk Management, Research and Specialty Crops
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 7/22/1999--Introduced. Amends the Agricultural Market Transition Act and the Agricultural Adjustment Act of 1983 to terminate peanut price support and marketing quota programs, respectively.
